Package io.servicetalk.http.api

Interface HttpExecutionStrategy

All Superinterfaces:
ExecutionStrategy
All Known Subinterfaces:
GrpcExecutionStrategy
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectAndHttpExecutionStrategy
public interface HttpExecutionStrategy extends ExecutionStrategy
An execution strategy for HTTP client and servers.
See Also:
  • HttpExecutionStrategyInfluencer

    from(ExecutionStrategy strategy)
    Convert from any ExecutionStrategy to the most appropriate compatible safe HttpExecutionStrategy.

    hasOffloads()
    Returns true if the instance has offloading for any operation.

    missing(HttpExecutionStrategy other)
    Returns an execution strategy which contains only the additional offloads present in other that were not present in this execution strategy.
